question: How does this paper(titled "FLatS: Principled Out-of-Distribution Detection with Feature-Based Likelihood Ratio Score") formulate the objective of OOD detection?If I want to contact the author(s) of the source paper of this formula, what is the email address I can refer to?

Second, find the formula used to formulate the objective.
Finally, turn to the source paper to find the email address of the author(s).
